bug.author: ggezer
bug.summary: Rapid leader transition causes web-server leak
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0+ Describe the bug In a quick fail-over from follower -> leader -> follower, a web server could leak. So the node will never be able to become a leader gain due to not being able to bind to port. To Reproduce Cause a quick transition of master role as described. Expected behavior We should not leak any resources during a quick state transition.
